statements: SELECT * FROM CopyrightInfringement;
SELECT media_title, infringement_type FROM CopyrightInfringement;
SELECT id, infringement_detected_at FROM CopyrightInfringement;
SELECT * FROM CopyrightInfringement WHERE infringement_type='Plagiarism';
SELECT media_title, infringement_detected_at FROM CopyrightInfringement WHERE infringement_detected_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, media_title, infringement_type FROM CopyrightInfringement WHERE infringement_detected_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CopyrightInfringement WHERE copyright_owner = 'ABC Inc' ORDER BY infringement_detected_at DESC;
SELECT media_title, COUNT(*) AS total_infringements FROM CopyrightInfringement GROUP BY media_title;
SELECT infringement_type, COUNT(*) AS total_infringements FROM CopyrightInfringement GROUP BY infringement_type ORDER BY total_infringements DESC;
SELECT * FROM CopyrightInfringement WHERE infringement_detected_at BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM MediaEntities;
SELECT entity_name, entity_type FROM MediaEntities WHERE entity_type = 'Video';
SELECT entity_name, entity_id FROM MediaEntities ORDER BY entity_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM MediaEntities WHERE entity_type = 'Image' AND entity_id < 100;
SELECT reporter_name, report_date FROM InfringementReports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM MediaEntities WHERE entity_type = 'Movie';
SELECT entity_name, entity_type FROM MediaEntities WHERE entity_type = 'TV Show' ORDER BY entity_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reports, entity_id FROM InfringementReports GROUP BY entity_id HAVING total_reports > 3;
SELECT reporter_name, report_date FROM InfringementReports WHERE entity_id IN (SELECT entity_id FROM MediaEntities WHERE entity_type = 'Music');

SELECT entity_id, entity_name, reporter_name, report_date FROM MediaEntities INNER JOIN InfringementReports ON MediaEntities.entity_id = InfringementReports.entity_id WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY entity_id ASC, report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MediaCompanies;
SELECT id, company_name, headquarters_location FROM MediaCompanies ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT company_name, headquarters_location FROM MediaCompanies WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM MediaAssets WHERE created_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT asset_name, media_type FROM MediaAssets WHERE media_type = 'Video' ORDER BY asset_name ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM MediaCompanies WHERE headquarters_location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT company_name, headquarters_location FROM MediaCompanies WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM MediaAssets WHERE media_type = 'Video' ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT asset_name, media_type, created_date FROM MediaAssets WHERE media_company_id = 1 AND created_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT infringement_date, perpetrator_name FROM CopyrightInfringements WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY infringement_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM infringement_cases;
SELECT case_name, case_status FROM infringement_cases WHERE case_status = 'Open';
SELECT content_name, content_type, content_owner FROM copyrighted_content WHERE release_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT case_id, report_date, reporter_name, report_description FROM infringement_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT action_id, case_id, action_type, action_date FROM enforcement_actions WHERE action_type = 'Fine' ORDER BY action_date;
SELECT * FROM infringement_cases;
SELECT case_id, case_name, infringement_date FROM infringement_cases WHERE case_status = 'Pending';
SELECT ic.case_name, cr.content_name, ir.report_date FROM infringement_cases ic JOIN infringement_reports ir ON ic.case_id = ir.case_id JOIN copyrighted_content cr ON cr.content_owner = 'Company X';
SELECT cr.content_name, ea.action_type, ea.action_date, ea.action_description FROM enforcement_actions ea JOIN copyrighted_content cr ON ea.case_id = cr.content_id;

SELECT ic.case_name, cr.content_name, ir.report_description FROM infringement_cases ic JOIN infringement_reports ir ON ic.case_id = ir.case_id JOIN copyrighted_content cr ON ir.report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT owner_name, company_name FROM MediaOwners;
SELECT * FROM MediaAssets WHERE media_type = 'Video';
SELECT claim_id, claim_description FROM CopyrightClaims ORDER BY claim_id DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_status FROM Reports WHERE report_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM MediaWatchlist WHERE watchlist_name LIKE '%infringement%';
SELECT * FROM MediaOwners ORDER BY owner_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, media_type FROM MediaAssets WHERE owner_id = 2 AND media_type = 'Video' ORDER BY asset_id ASC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_description, claimant_name FROM CopyrightClaims WHERE claim_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY claimant_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' AND report_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT watchlist_name, watchlist_id FROM MediaWatchlist WHERE watchlist_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY watchlist_id ASC;
